data.name: Capture of Providence
data.desc: Cartagena military expedition against Providence, shortly repulsed
data.agents_sp: Gov Melchior Aguilar, Antonio Maldonado y Tejada 1 Gal 6 Frigs 800 soldiers 200 Neg
data.prim_n: SANTA_FE,223 [Declaración a 2 jun 1640 / Junta a 12 jun 1640 / Lo mucho que conviene a 14 jun 1640 / Despacho a 19 jul 1640 / Relacion a 29 nov 1640] / Add MS 36323 f 297 / Mus Nav Navarrete vol 25 [Carta é informaciòn enviada por D. Juan Bitrian de Briamonte, 29 jun 1640] / Sanchez R [missg]
data.lit_n: Kupperman 336 fn 49 / Burns [missg] = ed 2 p 210 / Newton 295 / Genkins 112-117
data.note:
See 1640 Map in AGI, MP-PANAMA,61 [Plano a 29 nov 1640] /
 Gov. Carter marred his victory by putting to death the Spanish prisoners he had taken [> 100 men, 2 captains slain or taken], though their lives had been promised them /Newton 298
